description: Deletes the position history of one or more devices from a tracker resource.

parameters.name: TrackerName
parameters.description: The name of the tracker resource to delete the device position history from.

parameters.name: DeviceIds
parameters.description: Devices whose position history you want to delete. For example, for two devices: 'DeviceIds' : [DeviceId1,DeviceId2] (string) ---

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: Contains error details for each device history that failed to delete.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the device for this position.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the batch request error.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message with the reason for the batch request error.
